sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="add(props)">添加</el-button>
  <el-table
    :data="tbData.slice((currentPage - 1) * pagesize, currentPage * pagesize)"
    style="width: 100%"
  >
    <el-table-column type="expand" style="left: 20px">
      <template #default="props">
        <!-- <template > -->
        <el-table
          :data="props.row.children"
          style="width: 100%; margin-left: 40px"
        >
          <el-table-column prop="departmentName" label="科室" width="150" />
          <el-table-column prop="createTime" label="日期" width="300" />
          <el-table-column fixed="right" label="操作" width="200">
            <template #default="row">
              <el-button type="success" @click="handleClick(row)">
                编辑
              </el-button>
              <!-- 删除确认框 -->
              <el-popconfirm title="确定要删除吗?" @confirm="del(row)">
                <template #reference>
                  <el-button type="danger">删除</el-button>
                </template>
              </el-popconfirm>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="departmentName" />
  </el-table>
  <el-pagination
    currentPage="currentPage4"
    :page-sizes="[5, 10, 15, 20]"
    page-size="15"
    :background="background"
    layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
    :total="tbData.length"
    @size-change="handleSizeChange"
    @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
  />
</template>



<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
        currentPage: 1, //默认页码为1
      pagesize: 10, //默认一页显示10条
      dialogVisible: false,
      dialogVisible1: false,
      info: {}, //修改数据
      info1: {}, //新增数据
      tbData: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {
     handleSizeChange: function (size) {
      //一页显示多少条

      this.pagesize = size
    },

    handleCurrentChange: function (currentPage) {
      //页码更改方法

      this.currentPage = currentPage
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style lang='scss' scoped>
.demo-table-expand {
  font-size: 0;
}
.demo-table-expand label {
  width: 0px;
  color: #99a9bf;
}
.demo-table-expand .el-form-item {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  width: 50%;
}
.el-table
  .el-table--fit
  .el-table--enable-row-hover
  .el-table--enable-row-transition {
  margin-left: 47px !important;
}
</style>
